title: I LOVE ROME On its 90th anniversary, Carrani Tours renews its offer #UnescoJewelsOfItalyTravelandtourworld.com
text:
I LOVE ROME On its 90th anniversary, Carrani Tours renews its offer #UnescoJewelsOfItaly  
In honor of the TTG INCONTRI di Rimini, Carrani Tours launches #UnescoJewelsOfItaly, the hashtag that spotlights the activity sites associated with this prestigious title, which puts our country as top in the world for UNESCO World Heritage Sites: a label that attracts travelers and gives additional value to our country.
 
The visits to the principal UNESCO sites presented in the 2016 Tour Operator itineraries are different–particularly the full-day tour to the villas of Tivoli departing from Rome, the 3- and 4-day escorted tours in Valle d’Orcia, and the regional packages through the Dolomites.
 
Combined with the 90th anniversary, and strengthened by the partnership with Gray Line, Carrani Tours has invested in a new booking system, reassumed its main Rome operating hubs , acquired and relaunched the new I Love Rome Hop On – Hop Off service, and definitively improved its range of products, enhancing its efficiency to satisfy even the most demanding traveler.
 
Ahead of the Giubileo della Misericordia, Carrani Tours, acting as the official partner of the Vatican Museums, will upgrade the offer of guided visits to the museums, gardens, and areas typically closed to the public. Small group tours offered in English, German, and Spanish will enter without waiting in a queue. Priority access means entering the Sistine Chapel before anyone else, in addition to an exclusive visit to areas normally closed to the public, such as the Bramante Staircase. During Anno Santo, on top of its classic booking service for the Wednesday Papal audiences, Carrani Tours will also offer a visit to the city center that includes participation in Sunday morning mass.
 
When it comes to sightseeing in Rome, there are many different travel packages: Fantasia, Minitour, Mosaics and Regional. Each one presents an itinerary that allows travelers to visit the best of Italy, with the best price/quality exchange; staying in expertly-selected, centrally-located hotels; guided visits; and the guarantee to share the best culture, walks, and locations; surveying the best flavors and the unique atmosphere that is Italy.
 
Source:- Carrani Tours
